Subject: Printing diagnostics when test fails

I'm testing a complicated data structure, and I've written a method  
that prints the structure to the console for debugging purposes. I'd  
like to have this method run automatically if and only if a test  
fails. For instance, I'd like to write something like this:

@After
public void tearDown()
{
     if (testFailed())
         printDiagnostics();
}

Is there some way of doing that? Thanks,

Trevor
